背.definition: the back of a body or object; to turn one's back; to hide something from; to learn by heart; to recite from memory; unlucky (slang); hard of hearing

背井離鄉.definition: to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)

背信棄義.definition: breaking faith and abandoning right (idiom); to betray; treachery; perfidy

背倚.definition: to have one's back against; to lean against; to be backed up by (a mountain etc)

背光.definition: to be in a poor light; to do sth with one's back to the light; to stand in one's own light

背包.definition: knapsack; rucksack; infantry pack; field pack; blanket roll; CL:個|个[ge4]

背包袱.definition: to have a weight on one's mind; to take on a mental burden

背地.definition: secretly; in private; behind someone's back

背城借一.definition: to make a last-ditch stand before the city wall (idiom); to fight to the last ditch; to put up a desperate struggle

背山.definition: with back to the mountain (favored location)

背山臨水.definition: with back to the mountain and facing the water (favored location)

背帶.definition: braces; suspenders; sling (for a rifle); straps (for a knapsack)

背影.definition: rear view; figure seen from behind; view of the back (of a person or object)

背影兒.definition: erhua variant of 背影[bei4 ying3]

背影殺手.definition: (slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind; sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face; abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]

背後.definition: behind; at the back; in the rear; behind sb's back

背心.definition: sleeveless garment (vest, waistcoat, singlet, tank top etc); CL:件[jian4]

背景.definition: background; backdrop; context; (fig.) powerful backer; CL:種|种[zhong3]

背書.definition: to recite (a text) from memory; to learn a text by heart; to back; to endorse (a political candidate, product, check etc); backing; endorsement

背棄.definition: to abandon; to desert; to renounce

背榜.definition: to score last in an examination

背殺.definition: (slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind; sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face; abbr. for 背影殺手|背影杀手[bei4 ying3 sha1 shou3]

背氣.definition: to stop breathing (as a medical condition); (fig.) to pass out (in anger); to have a stroke

背水一戰.definition: lit. fight with one's back to the river (idiom); fig. to fight to win or die

背稱.definition: term used to refer to a person who is not present (e.g. 小姨子[xiao3 yi2 zi5]) (contrasted with 面稱|面称[mian4 cheng1])

背簍.definition: a basket carried on the back

背約.definition: to break an agreement; to go back on one's word; to fail to keep one's promise

背脊.definition: the back of the human body

背著.definition: turning one's back to (sth or sb); keeping sth secret from (sb); keeping (one's hands) behind one's back

背著手.definition: with one's hands clasped behind one's back

背著抱著一般重.pinyin: bei1 zhe5 bao4 zhe5 yi1 ban1 zhong4
背著抱著一般重.definition: lit. whether one carries it on one's back or in one's arms, it's equally heavy (idiom); fig. one can't avoid the burden

背誦.definition: to recite; to repeat from memory

背調.definition: background check (abbr. for 背景調查|背景调查[bei4 jing3 diao4 cha2]); to conduct a background check

背謬.definition: variant of 悖謬|悖谬[bei4 miu4]

背負.definition: to bear; to carry on one's back; to shoulder

背轉.definition: to turn away; to turn one's back to; (gymnastics etc) backspin

背道而馳.definition: to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to

背部.definition: back (of a human or other vertebrate, or of an object)

背鍋.definition: (slang) (neologism derived from 背黑鍋|背黑锅[bei1 hei1 guo1]) to carry the can; to be a scapegoat

背闊肌.definition: latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)

背離.definition: to depart from; to deviate from; deviation

背面.definition: the back; the reverse side; the wrong side

背黑鍋.definition: to be made a scapegoat; to be unjustly blamed
